unnormalised: My kiddo’s pediatrician, Dr. Verma, always says, “Give him 2.5ml of that syrup, even if he makes a face like he's seen a ghost!" LOL, kids and meds, amirite?
normalised: My kiddo’s pediatrician, Doctor Verma, always says, “Give him two point five milliliter of that syrup, even if he makes a face like he's seen a ghost!" L-O-L, kids and meds, am I right?
